header.gameNote: NBA Play-In - East - 9th Place vs 10th Place

videos.description: Malcolm Brogdon races in transition and dishes to Oshae Brissett for the one-handed jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Brogdon drops beautiful dime to Brissett for slam) 2021/5/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Brogdon drops beautiful dime to Brissett for slam

videos.description: Devonte' Graham loses control of the ball and scrambles to pick it up and drill the 3-pointer before the shot clock expires.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Graham scrambles to drain deep 3-pointer) 2021/5/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Graham scrambles to drain deep 3-pointer

videos.description: Edmond Sumner splits the Hornets' defense and floats it in to beat the first-quarter buzzer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Sumner floats in first-quarter buzzer-beater) 2021/5/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Sumner floats in first-quarter buzzer-beater

videos.description: Kelan Martin goes head-to-head in transition with LaMelo Ball and scores the layup with ease.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kelan Martin glides by LaMelo Ball for layup) 2021/5/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kelan Martin glides by LaMelo Ball for layup

videos.description: Malik Monk drives through traffic and dishes to Miles Bridges for a thunderous throwdown.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bridges throws down emphatic slam) 2021/5/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bridges throws down emphatic slam

videos.description: Miles Bridges meets Domantas Sabonis at the basket with a huge block and Devonte' Graham advances the ball to toss the alley-oop to Malik Monk for a jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Hornets get it done on both ends of the floor) 2021/5/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Hornets get it done on both ends of the floor

videos.description: Oshae Brissett nails consecutive shots for the Pacers to extend their lead to 29 points over the Hornets.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Brissett hyped after draining back-to-back buckets) 2021/5/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Brissett hyped after draining back-to-back buckets

videos.description: LaMelo Ball shows off his vision with a behind-the-back pass to Miles Bridges for a big slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LaMelo dishes impressive behind-the-back dime to Bridges) 2021/5/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: LaMelo dishes impressive behind-the-back dime to Bridges
